data.text: @willemhuman @yasserogier @stefanbar @gillianoberholzer Hi Guys. I feel that this is enhancements and should be addressed separately from the initial specification. We are currently wasting a lot of time and resources on this, which is adding a lot of pressure on the Government Gazettes Project. I think if initial development is done according to spec, and tested based on that, this can go live, and enhancements can be addressed later. Just my opinion.
